text: Taste My Steel! is a role-playing game published by Phantasy Network in 1982. ==Description== Taste My Steel! is a historical system of the swashbuckling era. The game includes rules for swordplay and swordsmanship, firearms, brawling, and creating scenarios and campaigns. ==Publication history== Taste My Steel! was designed by Don Johnson, and published by Phantasy Network in 1982 as a 56-page book. ==Reception== ==References== Category:Historical role- playing games Category:Role-playing games introduced in 1982 Category:Swashbuckler role-playing games
